name: nutritiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to food that contains the substances needed for life and growth: The survey found that far too many students are not eating nutritiously. We had a nutritiously rich salad of quinoa, green beans, peppers, and avocado.
More examplesFewer examplesI have been trying to cook more nutritiously since I was diagnosed with high cholesterol.He has written a book of recipes for people who want to eat nutritiously on a budget. Rather than just consuming less, I am trying to eat nutritiously dense whole foods.
